named-query.name: BC_READ_USER_BY_USER_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT user FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.User user WHERE user.username = :username

named-query.name: BC_READ_USER_BY_EMAIL
named-query.query: SELECT user FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.User user WHERE user.emailAddress = :email

named-query.name: BC_READ_ROLES_BY_USER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT role FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.UserRole role WHERE role.user.id = :userId
